ygData.subject: RE: [archive-crawler] Analysing 60TB of H3 state after 32TB of crawled data
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Andy, That definitely doesn t sound right. How many URLs have you crawled? How many hosts have you encountered (even hosts outside of scope get an entry)?
